channel.title: 667 - Drop Issues
channel.description:
I know this is a very known error, is the solution posted or does anyone know?
When you kill an NPC, or even a player in PVP, if you move whilst the NPC (or enemy player) is doing its death animation, the drop won't show.
How would you go upon fixing this? I'm on mobile atm, so I can't post my code, but if any code is needed ill get on my computer asap and post it.
Thanks :)
EDIT: It also effects slayer. If you move whilst the NPC is doing the death animation, you don't get any slayer EXP, along with no drop.
